title: Transforming solar farms: AI, robotics, and industry partnerships at AES
description:
AES discusses deploying Maximo robotics to automate solar farm construction, enhancing efficiency, safety, and scalability in clean energy projects.

The post Transforming solar farms: AI, robotics, and industry partnerships at AES appeared first on The Robot Report.
